title: Webflow developer
job_overview:
Job Title: Webflow Developer
Location: Remote
Job Type: Freelance (Flexible)
Salary: Competitive, based on experience

About Us:
We’re a growing digital team looking to bring on a talented Webflow Developer to help design, build, and optimize beautiful, functional websites. Whether it’s launching new marketing sites, improving existing user experiences, or building from Figma prototypes, you’ll play a critical role in creating web experiences that convert and inspire.

Key Responsibilities:
 • Design, develop, and maintain responsive websites using Webflow
 • Translate Figma or Adobe XD designs into fully functional Webflow pages
 • Collaborate with designers, marketers, and content creators to implement site updates
 • Optimize websites for performance, SEO, and accessibility
 • Set up Webflow CMS collections and dynamic content
 • Troubleshoot bugs and provide technical support when needed
 • Stay up to date with Webflow updates, features, and best practices

Requirements:
 • Proven experience building and maintaining websites in Webflow
 • Strong understanding of HTML, CSS, and Webflow’s visual development interface
 • Experience with Webflow CMS and site animations/interactions
 • Familiarity with SEO fundamentals and responsive design principles
 • Attention to detail and passion for clean, maintainable design
 • Ability to manage multiple projects and deadlines
 • Bonus: Experience with Zapier, Make (Integromat), or other automation tools

Nice to Have:
 • UI/UX design experience
 • JavaScript familiarity
 • E-commerce experience with Webflow (e.g., Webflow Ecommerce or Shopify integrations)

Why Join Us?
 • Fully remote work and flexible hours
 • Collaborative, supportive, and creative environment
 • Opportunities to grow and take ownership of projects
 • Work on diverse and exciting digital products

How to Apply:
Please send your portfolio, resume, and a brief note about why you’re a great fit to Include links to Webflow projects you’ve built
